title: Southampton vs Chelsea LIVE: Stream, latest score, goal updates, team news, prediction and more
text:
Chelsea travel to the south coast to take on Southampton as two promising sides dogged by inconsistency meet at St Mary's.

Frank Lampard has an ever-growing squad to call upon after the return to fitness of Callum Hudson-Odoi and Reece James in recent days.

Moussa Djenepo will be a miss for Saints after his lively start to the campaign but Ralph Hasenhuttl's side have shown enough so far to suggest the can give Chelsea a hard game. Follow it live:

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Gareth Southgate will be casting his eye upon the trio of Chelsea academy graduates in the England squad- Tomori with his first call up, Abraham returns and Mount in once more. Surely to be joined by Hudson-Odoi next international break when his injury woes are in the past. As for the hosts...Valery in at right back, and Long also starts in what could either be a front three with Redmond and Ings. Could also set up more like a 4-2-2-2 with one of Redmond or Long playing off the front two. No Vestegaard in the squad as Bednarek partners Yoshida. Kante is also starting once more after a series of injury problems. Is he finally set to play a big part in Chelsea's season? The big news for Chelsea? Hudson-Odoi finally starts after an achilles tendon injury he picked up in April. Advertisement Chelsea starting XI: Kepa Azpilicueta Tomori Zouma Alonso Jorginho Kante Willian Mount Hudson-Odoi Abraham Southampton starting XI: Gunn Valery Bednarek Yoshida Betrand Hojbjerg Romeu Ward-Prowse Redmond Long Ings Southampton vs Chelsea Teams coming shortly... Prediction

Chelsea to be too strong for Southampton after a tough encounter. 2-1.
